STEAKS.description: All steaks are served with your choice of side dish and a garden salad.

Ribeye Steak.description: A juicy ribeye steak grilled to perfection.

Filet Mignon.description: Tender filet mignon cooked to your liking.

New York Strip.description: A classic New York strip steak, char-grilled to perfection.

T-Bone Steak.description: A hearty T-bone steak, grilled to your preference.

SEAFOOD.description: Enjoy our delicious seafood dishes, served with your choice of side dish and a garden salad.

Grilled Salmon.description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled with lemon and herbs.

Shrimp Scampi.description: Tender shrimp saut√©ed in garlic butter and white wine sauce.

Lobster Tail.description: A succulent lobster tail, served with drawn butter.

Fish and Chips.description: Crispy battered fish fillets served with French fries and tartar sauce.

CHICKEN.description: Savor our flavorful chicken dishes, served with your choice of side dish and a garden salad.

Grilled Chicken Breast.description: Juicy chicken breast grilled to perfection.

Chicken Marsala.description: Tender chicken breasts cooked in a rich Marsala wine sauce.

Stuffed Chicken.description: Chicken breasts stuffed with spinach, mushrooms, and cheese, baked to perfection.

Lemon Herb Chicken.description: Succulent chicken breasts marinated in lemon and herbs, grilled to perfection.

PASTA.description: Indulge in our comforting pasta dishes, served with garlic bread and a garden salad.

Spaghetti Carbonara.description: Spaghetti tossed in a creamy bacon and egg sauce.

Fettuccine Alfredo.description: Fettuccine pasta in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce.

Lasagna.description: Layers of pasta, meat sauce, and cheese baked to perfection.

Chicken Parmesan.description: Breaded chicken breast topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese, served over spaghetti.

Beverages.description: Quench your thirst with our refreshing selection of beverages, ranging from classic sodas like Coke and 7UP to a variety of teas, fruit juices, and specialty drinks. Whether you're craving a fizzy cola, a zesty citrus soda, or a soothing cup of tea, we have the perfect beverage to complement your meal and keep you refreshed.
